headline: Looking At The Narrative For L3Harris Technologies After Missile Spinout And Department Of War Deal
summary: The fair value estimate for L3Harris Technologies has been raised from about US$364 to roughly US$380.63, with updated modeling also reflecting slightly different assumptions for revenue growth and discount rate. Street research has reacted to the planned spinout of the Missile Solutions business and the planned US$1b preferred equity investment from the Department of War, which together are feeding into refreshed views on what the stock could be worth. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on...

headline: ACHR Underperforms Industry in the Past 6 Months: Time to Buy or Hold?
summary: Archer Aviation's shares have dropped 23.5% in six months, even as it pushes AI-driven aviation plans, global expansion and trades at a discount.

headline: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Backlog Growth Drives Higher Price View at Bernstein
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is included among 12 Unstoppable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 6, Bernstein raised its price recommendation on L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) to $405 from $398. It maintained an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm pointed to the company’s Q4 results, reported on January 29, which came […]
